name: Cerbero 15-5-30 + 2 MgO
description: Cerbero 15-5-30 + 2 MgO is a NPK water-soluble fertilizer for fertirrigation with a high percentage of nitrogen-potassium, featuring a very high degree of solubility, purity and the absence of chlorine and sodium. The 3:1:6 NPK ratio makes it particularly suitable for fertilization of crops that require high supplies of nitrogen and potassium and low doses of phosphorus.
